From: "Logo morph" <logomorph@...>

::Fidgit/Shadow Wing::

Fidgit: She looked as Beahcomber yelled at her about his friend.
"I'll help."
She ran outside after Beachcomber. She ran towards the cliffs after him.



Shadow Wing: She saw the four missles homing in on her. She dodged two of 
them and watched them detonate against some trees.  She weaved in and out of 
the trees, dipping and raising up trying to dodge.  See lost the third one 
but the fourth was right on her tail.  She turned around and flew back at 
the Predacons.  She flew right past Injector and missed him by a few feet.  
The heat seeking missle was now heading for them.

---------Original Message----------
From:   <KSLawdogg@c...>
Date: Fri Jun 23, 2000 2:47pm
Subject: Neo Beast Wars RPG



Beachcomber/Double Punch/Injector/Manterror:



Double Punch was angry.  As she retreated, he opened both his pinchers now,
firing two energy-signature seeking missiles off at Shadow Wing.

Injector fired off two stinger missiles at Shadow Wing.  After he and
Manterror had cried out in pain from optic blasts.

Manterror raised his weapons at Cyber Claw.  "Speak quickly, or you will
never speak again!"

---

"I have a friend out there!" Beachcomber yelled, running out of the Ark and
heading for where he saw explosions on a cliff.
